name: goal-story
description: a Goal Tracker and Visualization Tool for personal and professional development.

tools.name: goalstory_about
tools.description: Retrieve information about Goal Story's philosophy and the power of story-driven goal achievement. Use this to help users understand the unique approach of Goal Storying.

tools.name: goalstory_read_self_user
tools.description: Get the user's profile data including their preferences, belief systems, and past goal history to enable personalized goal storying and context-aware discussions.

tools.name: goalstory_update_self_user
tools.description: Update the user's profile including their name, visibility preferences, and personal context. When updating 'about' data, guide the user through questions to understand their motivations, beliefs, and goal-achievement style.

tools.name: goalstory_count_goals
tools.description: Get the total number of goals in the user's journey. Useful for tracking overall progress and goal management patterns.

tools.name: goalstory_create_goal
tools.description: Begin the goal clarification process by creating a new goal. Always discuss and refine the goal with the user before or after saving, ensuring it's well-defined and aligned with their aspirations. Confirm if any adjustments are needed after creation.

tools.name: goalstory_update_goal
tools.description: Update goal details including name, status, description, outcomes, evidence of completion, and story/belief modes that influence how stories are generated.

tools.name: goalstory_destroy_goal
tools.description: Remove a goal and all its associated steps and stories from the user's journey. Use with confirmation to prevent accidental deletion.

tools.name: goalstory_read_one_goal
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific goal to support focused discussion and story creation.

tools.name: goalstory_read_goals
tools.description: Get an overview of the user's goal journey, with optional pagination to manage larger sets of goals.

tools.name: goalstory_read_current_focus
tools.description: Identify which goal and step the user is currently focused on to maintain context in discussions and story creation.

tools.name: goalstory_get_story_context
tools.description: Gather rich context about the user, their current goal/step, beliefs, and motivations to create deeply personalized and meaningful stories. Combines user profile data with conversation insights.

tools.name: goalstory_create_steps
tools.description: Formulate actionable steps for a goal through thoughtful discussion. Present the steps for user review either before or after saving, ensuring they're clear and achievable. Confirm if any refinements are needed.

tools.name: goalstory_read_steps
tools.description: Access the action plan for a specific goal, showing all steps in the journey toward achievement.

tools.name: goalstory_read_one_step
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific step to support focused discussion and story creation.

tools.name: goalstory_update_step
tools.description: Update step details including the name, completion status, evidence, and outcome. Use this to track progress and insights.

tools.name: goalstory_destroy_step
tools.description: Remove a specific step from a goal's action plan.

tools.name: goalstory_update_step_notes
tools.description: Update step notes with additional context, insights, or reflections in markdown format. Use this to capture valuable information from discussions.

tools.name: goalstory_create_story
tools.description: Generate and save a highly personalized story that visualizes achievement of the current goal/step. Uses understanding of the user's beliefs, motivations, and context to create engaging mental imagery. If context is needed, gathers it through user discussion and profile data.

tools.name: goalstory_read_stories
tools.description: Access the collection of personalized stories created for a specific goal/step pair, supporting reflection and motivation.

tools.name: goalstory_read_one_story
tools.description: Retrieve a specific story to revisit the visualization and mental imagery created for goal achievement.

YOUR_API_KEY.description: The API key required to authenticate your requests to the Goal Story service.
YOUR_API_KEY.title: YOUR_API_KEY
